description:
• Built backend services from the ground up with Golang and Python to integrate OCR and LLM models to digitize receipt data, replacing the legacy receipt text recognition system, delivering over $6M in annual cost savings and 30% user growth over 4 years.

• Led the end-to-end lifecycle of new microservices, partnering with frontend and data quality teams to ensure seamless integration and accuracy, reducing data correction time by 40%.

• Implemented SNS and SQS to build an event-driven architecture that triggers Lambda-based workflows for automated model experiments.

• Spearheaded the adoption of AWS services S3 Express One Zone by evaluating pros and cons, conducting thorough investigations, and driving innovation through well-informed experimentation.

• Led a team of 5 engineers and QA specialists in deploying automation systems, ensuring scalable and high-quality production environments.

• Designed and implemented Python automation scripts and custom monitoring dashboards to support IoT devices, reducing manual errors by 30% and increasing throughput by 25% within six months.

• Collaborated with customers to deliver timely technical support, continuously enhancing system scalability and reliability to meet evolving user needs.

• Developed Python/Flask backend services to optimize truck route planning, improving load management and operational efficiency for drivers.

• Implemented React frontend pages integrated with backend APIs, leveraging SQLAlchemy ORM for efficient data retrieval.

 • Integrated automated unit testing frameworks into the CI/CD pipeline, achieving 85%+ test coverage and reducing release cycle bottlenecks, enabling the team to ship features 30% faster with fewer regressions.

• Collaborated with the software engineering team to design and implement scalable notification services supporting over 2,000 users in the LA area using Node.js.

• Developed a robust Mocha unit testing template, improving bug detection and maintaining code quality across five core services

• Built an Angular-based frontend GUI that streamlined employee workflows and reduced analysis workload

• Integrated REST API endpoints to enable secure, real-time communication between embedded controllers and server applications, increasing system reliability and facilitating cross-platform interactions
Worked independently on mechanical machines design. Closed the most crucial project in company history by developing the storage tower system that generate 15% revenue in the fiscal year.
